author: rhuijben
msg: Make wc_db.c's scan_addition() function follow the usual wc_db pattern that the
private apis are called within a transaction and don't obtain one itself.
This api is used by quite a lot of other functions that already have a lock and
(scan_addition_txn): Rename to scan_addition and move comment here.
svn_wc__db_scan_moved): Use a lock around scan_addition.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-5417: fail if the chaosmonkey runs for over 20 seconds and doesn't kill a jetty
